title: PPC SPECIALIST
description:
A well known agency is on the search for their next PPC Specialist!

On a daily basis you will be working closely with their client-facing team members (Account Managers) and together delivering amazing ongoing results for their client campaigns.

Their goal is to not just generate leads for clients, but great quality leads that drive their business forward. They are all about developing long lasting relationships, and they love to watch client’s businesses grow on the back of their amazing work.

A specialist in PPC, but also a solid understanding of other Digital Marketing Specialties (e.g SEO, CRO) and a willingness to continuously keep your knowledge up to date.
Ability to work across several projects at a time.
Reliability, discipline, and accountability to the rest of the team
Experience with Google Analytics, SEO tools, and paid search tools.

title: CANDIDATE MANAGER - DIGITAL
description:
To begin with - if you’re unaware of what a Candidate Manager does? It is effectively looking for and speaking to all the amazing Digital Talent Brisbane has to offer.
Essentially, your new role will be to find people utilising a multitude of tools to-hand, qualify these individuals and flag their details to the consultant/s in the team - with the ultimate aim of successfully finding people what some may define as career-defining opportunities.

We help connect talent with fantastic work opportunities’ within the digital arena*
  
Brief back-story on why we're hiring:

We're weeing a distinct trend across the digital communities we focus on delivering to. We require another person to join the team to help bolster our delivery capabilities. 
What does this mean? Well some people sit in the Candidate Manager’s role for 12-24 months (and thoroughly enjoy doing so), whilst some people pick it up quickly and get promoted is less than 6 months - it genuinely depends on the individual, and that’s completely fine.

At JDP we pride ourselves on letting people work as adults, we do not have KPI's, work a hybrid WFH scenario once probation complete, and we DO NOT micromanage. As different as we all are, we share the same drive and passion for doing the right things.
We are a team; we work collaboratively, and the results speak for themselves.

For anyone that is new we provide training. This is done one-one and also as a wider group, but the result is that you are never left alone or unsure of what to do, and this is how we continue to build on our success.


The attributes we'd love you to have are:

A natural ability to build rapport with complete strangers
A great memory or at least the ability to further train this aspect
An excellent phone manner
Levels of tenacity that would see you continuously strive to assist others
The ability to have fun
Drive – huge amounts of drive
Enjoy network events (social butterfly)
Enjoy social media
Enjoy earning money. I’m happy to explain the earning potential across an initial discussion
   
We are offering:

The chance to work with a fun and social team
Team events (quarterly, and regardless of results)
A great team to learn from
Awesome Commission Structure
Work with excellent consultants earning amazing money
  
If you want to know more about working at Just Digital People, have a look at our LinkedIn page or visit our website. If working here interests you, feel free to apply online, or even better, drop me a line personally – Sam Needs – 0430 629 712

description:
2 days per week in the office (stunning offices) 
Option to work remotely overseas 
Leading SaaS business that are stable and growing steadily
JDP are stoked to be partnering with a very well known Australian SaaS company. They have a stellar reputation for technology and innovation, evolving over time to offer comprehensive and modern products to their customers.

title: JUNIOR PR SPECIALIST - SENIOR ACCOUNT EXECUTIVE
description:
Just Digital People are thrilled to partner up with a boutique PR agency looking to find their next unreal Senior Account Executive in Sydney, NSW.

You’re a people person – customer service comes naturally, you know how to manage clients and ensure maximum satisfaction

description:

With staff in the US and Europe they they have a global (and loyal) client base with millions of users and a truely scalable product that is providing measurable ROI and a seamless User Experience. whilst very established in their space they have a streamlined and lean organisation who are nimble and able to make decisions quickly.

Someone who has knowledge across any or all of the following areas - SaaS, Fin-Tech, Payments, Mar-Tech, Sports

Able to demonstrate tangible success and growth of their team / business

Join the Winning Team at this Australian household name as a Product Manager
 
Location: Melbourne, VIC, hybrid model 3/2 split
Salary: Up to $150,000
 
Just Digital People are proud to be partnering with an Australian household name in the tech-wagering. They have a product used by millions of Australians.
 
Before we talk business, here is what you really want to know, what bells and whistles are attached to this already exciting role!
 
The Perks:

Career Development: A multitude of development opportunities to further your career.
Fun and Community: Celebrate big events, enjoy free breakfasts, and participate in charity and social activities

The Business:
 
These guys love YOUR different.
 
From the moment you walk through the doors, you'll feel the buzz—this is a place where you can really shine with YOUR different. Having fun is part of their daily grind. They are all about shaking things up, stepping out of comfort zones, and inspiring each other to reach new heights… all while building cooler sh*t for their customers.
 
They constantly attribute their success to their awesome team, whose collective creativity and zest not only create unforgettable experiences for their customers but also make this an amazing spot for you to be your best and do your best.
 
Big on looking after their crew and community. Balancing work and play? That's just how they roll. Keeping you healthy and happy, whether that’s physically, emotionally, or financially, is at the top of the agenda.
 
Growing your career here means you’re in the driver's seat—ready to power up and go full throttle – sports joke, cliché I know.
 
The Role:
 
As a Product Manager, focusing on app experience, you will be part of an awesome team of 6 aiming to elevate their product landscape. You will drive the strategy, roadmap, and execution of products and new features, that have customers shouting F-Yeah from the rooftops. Your role is critical in making and keeping their app and wider business being the best at what they do.  
 
What You’ll Bring:

Proven experience in product management, ideally building and shipping products to consumers (B2C)
You’ll be a driving force in the product team in your current role, unfortunately, this won’t be a role for someone to step up into, but rather looking for exceptional product manager, ready to take on big application projects from day 1.
Leadership skills with the ability to inspire and manage forever changing teams of specialists

Excellent analytical skills to evaluate market trends and user feedback.
Being a good all-round human, this is not a role for your everyday ego maniac or the Patrick Bateman types.
